EmailTemplate.description: Notification should be generated when 'Consigned Wafer' checkbox is selected. This indicates that the Service Type is SQE and SQE Team has to update the BX009
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: BX009 having SQE Service Type
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has a SQE Service Type
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has a SQE Service Type. Please update the BX009 with SQE specific details. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
